name: cscript
description: A high-level, dynamic, interpreted, weakly-interpreted scripting language in the Lisp-1 family with an integrated REPL. Built using a bottom-up parser which constructs a metaprogrammed AST using the visitor pattern.

name: Granthomukhim
description: A context-free non-semantic word generator for my custom natural language (classified theoretically as aggultinative-fusional Indo-Aryan-Dravidian). Uses a parser set to the rules of a grammar represented via the Chomsky Normal Form (CNF). Follows a system of atomic roots modified to achieve nuanced meaning to form stems, which are further affixed to form words. Internal sandhi is also applied within the word.

name: ParcelTrack
description: Automatically manage parcels at the reception. Includes an interface for the security guards at the gate to log the incoming and outgoing package activity. Students can use MS Auth to login and check/return/pickup their own/trusted packages.

name: The PRiL Text Editor
description: A simple GUI-based text editor with universal file support. Built with the wxWidgets UI framework.
